info.title: British Numbers API
info.description: API for querying and purchasing British memorable phone numbers.

get.description: Allows clients to search for memorable phone numbers based on various criteria.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Determines which fields to search on. Defaults to 'number' if left blank.

parameters.name: match
parameters.description: Determine if you want an exact match. Defaults to a fuzzy match if left blank.

parameters.name: price_gte
parameters.description: Filter by price (greater than or equal to).

parameters.name: price_lte
parameters.description: Filter by price (less than or equal to).

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Select the range you wish to retrieve, format 'start-end'. Max 100 records.

200.description: A list of memorable phone numbers.

post.summary: Submit a purchase request for one or more numbers
post.description: Submit a request to purchase memorable phone numbers.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number(s) you wish to purchase. Can be repeated for multiple numbers.
